replies.msg:
過幾日又放榜, 有心想讀nursing但又自覺考得唔太好都應該諗過入唔同既asso/high dip 或者係nursing school
大家有乜疑問/擔心都可以隨便問
每年都有個hs post

同埋好似要由year1讀起 唔似得nursing有senior entry可以直入year3

姐係到時放榜我直接行去hkcc再填過重新擺過program choice?

係
Eapp比個conditional offer你先就係等你唔洗放榜之後咁頻撲搵書讀
Walkin你當行入去重新去報返多名得架啦 到時會有一車車dse雞車入去 大把指示比你跟 唔洗驚咁多
最緊要都係帶齊文件

Btw. 不過都係到時放榜再算啦 開心玩埋呢幾日先 話唔定唔洗黎呢

Hkcc health studies 同 hkuspace nursing 有咩分別？

space個nursing 係hd 黎 做完應該會有個en牌比你直接做野

hkcc hs 同 space仲有科叫health science 既就係asso
讀完係冇牌比你做護士既
呢兩科讀完 又唔夠分升返nursing既話＝乞食

The candidates must have a minimum of 5 subjects in the Hong Kong Diploma of Secondary
Education Examination, or equivalent, or any recognized qualification above. The 5 compulsory
subjects required are:-
(a) 4 Core Subjects, with English Language and Chinese Language at Level 3 or above, and
Mathematics and Liberal Studies at Level 2 or above; and
(b) 1 Elective Subject from Category A* – New Senior Secondary Subjects at Level 2 or above.
